description: Change Rust server. Use Battlemetrics.com to determine the server ID and register with /change_server.
Get a list of all players from the Rust server that are currently online with battelmatrics id

Add a new player. Use Battlemetrics.com to find out the player ID and enter /change_server. Add a note to the player. Now, if necessary, create a new team or assign it to the new player in an existing team via the menu.
Remove player. Select a player from the list to remove him/her.
Remove team. Select team from the list to remove it.
Clear watchlist. Attention removes all players and all teams irrevocably.
Team check. Checks a player for possible team members on the server using their steam ID.
